html:
Jan 28 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Adecco Group, Entain and Randstad, on Thursday.


HIGHLIGHTS

* Adecco Group AG ADEN.S: Jefferies cuts to underperform from hold

* Bellway Plc BWY.L: Peel Hunt raises to buy from hold

* Entain ENT.L: Barclays raises to overweight from equal weight

* Persimmon PSN.L: Peel Hunt raises to buy from add

* Randstad NV RAND.AS: Jefferies cuts to underperform from hold

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Thursday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* A.G. Barr BAG.L: Barclays raises target price to 490p from 430p

* Adecco Group AG ADEN.S: Jefferies cuts target price to CHF 50 from CHF 56

* Adecco Group AG ADEN.S: Jefferies cuts to underperform from hold
